price: 15. Caagid usuk (abu jahal kinnuk) elle yakkale inna hinna, usuk tamahak kate wee kaa tekkek gombo kaak gibdi xibixih abbixenno, jahannam girat kaa gasiyak.
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
